comments.text: ContentScriptErrorReporter attempts to report them, so someone needs to dig into the actual script execution to see if the information is available somewhere so we can populate the report correctly.

https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1472046

Move all DOM bugs that haven’t been updated in more than 3 years and has no one currently assigned to P5.

If you have questions, please contact :mdaly.
